mapper.select:
select rownum, A.* from ( select * from board where b_id=#{b_id} order by b_no DESC )A
where rownum < 7

select * from ticketView where mem_id=#{mem_id} and r_checkpay='Y'
and s_startTime < SYSDATE
select * from ticketView where mem_id=#{mem_id} and r_checkpay='Y' and s_startTime >= SYSDATE
